# Angelica Parente

> Programming intelligence into immunity

## About

Biophysicist and venture capitalist working at the intersection of AI, novel therapeutics, and microglia research.

## Navigation

- [Bio](bio.html) - Background and current work
- [Research](research.html) - Academic and personal research
- [Writing](writing.html) - Blog posts and essays
- [Likes](likes.html) - Curated interests and inspirations
- [Contact](contact.html) - Get in touch

## Technical Details

- Built with Vite and vanilla JavaScript
- Background animation: neural network with flocking behavior and breathing motion
- Canvas-based rendering with Retina display support
